name: international-standards-viewer
description: International Standards Viewer - Convert JSON standards to Markdown and view them

scripts.build: npm run generate:styles:async && npm run generate:component-index && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:vite: npm run generate:styles:async && npm run generate:component-index && vite build && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:vite:clean: npm run clean:force && npm run build:vite
scripts.generate:styles:async: npm run generate:manifest:async && npm run generate:schema:async
scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-css && npm run copy-json && npm run copy-app-styles && npm run copy-sample-files
scripts.copy-css: if not exist dist\components\XWUIItem (mkdir dist\components\XWUIItem) && if exist src\components\component\XWUIItem\XWUIItem.css (copy /Y src\components\component\XWUIItem\XWUIItem.css dist\components\XWUIItem\XWUIItem.css) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIConsole (mkdir dist\components\XWUIConsole) && if exist src\components\power\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.css (copy /Y src\components\power\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.css dist\components\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.css) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector (mkdir dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector) && if exist src\components\component\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.css (copy /Y src\components\component\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.css dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.css) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIButton (mkdir dist\components\XWUIButton) && if exist src\components\component\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.css (copy /Y src\components\component\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.css dist\components\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.css) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor (mkdir dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor) && if exist src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.css (copy /Y src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.css dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.css)
scripts.copy-json: if not exist dist\data (mkdir dist\data) && if exist data\conf_sys.json (copy /Y data\conf_sys.json dist\data\conf_sys.json) && if exist data\conf_usr.json (copy /Y data\conf_usr.json dist\data\conf_usr.json) && if exist data\conf_sys.schema.json (copy /Y data\conf_sys.schema.json dist\data\conf_sys.schema.json) && if exist data\conf_usr.schema.json (copy /Y data\conf_usr.schema.json dist\data\conf_usr.schema.json) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIConsole (mkdir dist\components\XWUIConsole) && if exist src\components\power\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.schema.json (copy /Y src\components\power\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.schema.json dist\components\XWUIConsole\XWUIConsole.schema.json) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector (mkdir dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector) && if exist src\components\component\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.schema.json (copy /Y src\components\component\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.schema.json dist\components\XWUIStyleSelector\XWUIStyleSelector.schema.json) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIButton (mkdir dist\components\XWUIButton) && if exist src\components\component\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.schema.json (copy /Y src\components\component\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.schema.json dist\components\XWUIButton\XWUIButton.schema.json) && if not exist dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor (mkdir dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor) && if exist src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.schema.json (copy /Y src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.schema.json dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\XWUIScriptEditor.schema.json) && if not exist dist\styles (mkdir dist\styles) && if exist src\styles\styles.schema.json (copy /Y src\styles\styles.schema.json dist\styles\styles.schema.json) && if exist src\styles\styles.data.json (copy /Y src\styles\styles.data.json dist\styles\styles.data.json)
scripts.copy-app-styles: if not exist dist\app (mkdir dist\app) && if not exist dist\app\styles (mkdir dist\app\styles) && if exist src\app\styles\base.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\base.css dist\app\styles\base.css) && if exist src\app\styles\testers.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\testers.css dist\app\styles\testers.css) && if exist src\app\styles\theme_light.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\theme_light.css dist\app\styles\theme_light.css) && if exist src\app\styles\theme_dark.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\theme_dark.css dist\app\styles\theme_dark.css) && if exist src\app\styles\theme_night.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\theme_night.css dist\app\styles\theme_night.css) && if exist src\app\styles\theme_silver.css (copy /Y src\app\styles\theme_silver.css dist\app\styles\theme_silver.css)
scripts.copy-sample-files: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (-not (Test-Path 'dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\testers')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\testers' | Out-Null }; if (-not (Test-Path 'dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\testers\files')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\testers\files' | Out-Null }; if (Test-Path 'src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\testers\files') { Copy-Item -Path 'src\components\super\XWUIScriptEditor\testers\files\*' -Destination 'dist\components\XWUIScriptEditor\testers\files\' -Recurse -Force }"
scripts.clean:force: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path 'dist') { Remove-Item -Path 'dist' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; if (Test-Path 'dist') { Write-Warning 'Some files may still be locked. Try closing file explorers, IDEs, or waiting for OneDrive to finish syncing.' } }"
scripts.generate:styles: npm run generate:manifest && npm run generate:css && npm run generate:schema
